title: Support needed for Flex
body:
Looking for a Support Gold/Silver that want to be apart of a Flex Team

Must have a Working Mic and have to be able to play more than 1 support champion

Flex team is a laid back environment, we're all slowly getting used to one another so you wont be a black sheep.

add me "Shiney" {{champion:51}}

replies.body: Too bad I can only play one support champ :(
